name: Wiyafa Matela (Serene Garden)
description:
Welcome gardener !

The keeper, the old guardian spirit of the garden needs your help. The garden is decaying and the strenght of  the keeper is fading. Tend the garden to its former glory and help the keeper to regain its strenght.

Oh, and don't forget to find your inner peace while you're at it.

Serene Garden is a small puzzle/exploration game made with môsi, a tiny game engine inspired by Bitsy. 

How to play

Use the arrow keys to move and bump into things that might be of interest. Find objects and skills to help you restore the garden.

Features
  • Non-violent gameplay
  • A nice and quiet garden to explore and revive
  • 8 secret haikus, pompously named « pearl of wisdom »
  • 8-bit style graphics and music
  • A secret ending
